results.title: Antihypertensive therapy and the benefits of atorvastatin in the Anglo-Scandinavian Cardiac Outcomes Trial: lipid-lowering arm extension.
results.text_hl: OBJECTIVE: To determine the cardiovascular benefits of @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@ stratified by blood pressure-lowering regimen, 2.2 years after closure of the @CHEMICAL_Lipids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008055 @@@lipid@@@-lowering arm (LLA) of the Anglo-Scandinavian Cardiac Outcomes Trial (@<m>DISEASE_Pneumonia_Lipid</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011017 @@@ASCOT-LLA@@@). METHODS: In @<m>DISEASE_Pneumonia_Lipid</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011017 @@@ASCOT-LLA@@@, 10,305 @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertensive@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ randomized to @CHEMICAL_Amlodipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@-based or @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@-based therapy and with a total @CHEMICAL_Cholesterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002784 @@@cholesterol@@@ 6.5 mmol/l or less were further randomized to @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@ or placebo.

citations.NLM: Sever PS, Poulter NR, Dahlof B, Wedel H, ASCOT Investigators. Antihypertensive therapy and the benefits of atorvastatin in the Anglo-Scandinavian Cardiac Outcomes Trial: lipid-lowering arm extension. J Hypertens. 2009 May;27(5):947-54. PMID: 19318984
